about_the_game:
You just got out of prison, serving time for a crime that you did not commit, and on top of that you have had debts that have been accruing this whole time. Now it's time to take to the ever-changing streets to acquire gold, and take on bounties to take out rival crime bosses.

Dexterous: Time to Steal plays like a combination of Candy Crush and Slay the Spire. Loot powerful offensive and defensive blocks that will help you survive the streets. Match 3 blocks of the same color to use the abilities they contain. When deadly foes defeat you, a mysterious force pulls you back in time to try again, and again... and again.

Features:

  • Collect and upgrade blocks to increase your power and help defeat foes and rival crime bosses.
  • Gather game-changing relics that will make every run unique.
  • Take resources you find back to your hideout to unlock permanent upgrades.
  • Explore the ever-changing streets, ensuring a new run every time.
  • Unlock new difficulties with each successful run.

short_description: A Match-3 Roguelite where you build your deck of blocks, collect game-changing relics, and battle your way through crime bosses in an attempt to pay off your debt and escape the time loop.
